div.p: Congratulations to Memorial Middle School on winning a State Board of Education Momentum Award. These recognize schools for exceeding expectations in student growth for the year. Schools must earn straight A’s on all Value-Added measures on the report card. The school...

a.title: Hilliard Darby High School Graduation - More information
Hilliard Bradley High School Graduation - More information

div.p:
Superintendent, John Marschhausen, Ph.D.
Treasurer, Brian W. Wilson

HILLIARD CITY SCHOOL DISTRICT
2140 ATLAS STREET
COLUMBUS, OH 43228
